alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:52AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy showers with isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Suffolk, Essex and northeastern Middlesex Counties through 545 AM EDT... At 451 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy showers with isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from near North Reading to Stoneham to Lexington. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Lynn, Newton, Somerville, Waltham, Malden, Medford, Revere, Peabody, Arlington, Everett, Salem, Billerica, Beverly, Woburn, Chelmsford, Andover, Natick, Watertown and Lexington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex
